activities: APX, either directly or through its subsidiaries, receives renewable facility and project-level information which may include personal information. It uses that data to issue unique, serialized identifiers. It then aggregates that information and makes it available to our Registry clients and to the public as appropriate.  It also provides its Environmental Management Account product, or EMA, to corporate customers, helping them manage their holdings of environmental commodities.  In the course of providing the EMA service, personal information of the customer's officers and employees may be collected.  Lastly, it offers registry services to customers holding voluntary carbon offsets.  In the course of providing the registry services, personal information of the customers or of their officers and employees may be collected.
corpofftitle1: Managing Director, Secretary and General Counsel
eucountries: Austria, France, Germany, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: We will use the EU data protection authorities (DPAs) for dispute resolution
